name: Herman Biscuits
author: Sue
summary: This is a great biscuit recipe for using Herman sourdough starter.
directions: Bring Herman Starter to room temperature
Stir together flour, baking soda, baking powder and salt
Stir flour mixture and oil into Herman Starter
It will form a soft dough
On a lightly floured surface knead dough until smooth
Pinch off small pieces of dough and shape into balls OR roll dough out and cut with a biscuit cutter
Place biscuits onto a greased baking sheet, cover and let rise in a warm place for 1 hour
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Bake in biscuits in the preheat oven for about 30 minutes or until golden
